actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: To amend the Atomic Energy Act to provide the Nuclear Regulatory Commission with authority to hold and expend funds received under surety arrangements required under NRC regulations for their intended purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to authorize the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to hold and expend funds received under certain financial arrangements for purposes of decommissioning, decontamination, reclamation, or post-accident facility stabilization and cleanup.

titles.title: To amend the Atomic Energy Act to provide the Nuclear Regulatory Commission with authority to hold and expend funds received under surety arrangements required under NRC regulations for their intended purposes.
